segments.text: Hi charles , I want you know that i finally found an apartment in haitian .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I am having a party this saturday night , a sort of house warming , and i want to invite you . are you busy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No i am free , i will be there , what time the thing starting ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , great , should i bring anything ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but thanks for offering , actually could you bring some fold-up chairs for people if you have any ? I am afraid not everyone's going to have a seat , do you have any ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure , I will be happy to bring a few , what is the address ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry , I will come to pick you up at about six thirty .
segments.speaker: S1
